mapper.select: select id, mainOrderNo, tripOrderNo, cardId, cardNo, cardType, memberId, useStatus, reason, occupyTime, writeoffTime, createTime, createUser, updateTime, updateUser from union_order.resource_consumer_order where id = #{id}

select id, mainOrderNo, tripOrderNo, cardId, cardNo, cardType, memberId, useStatus, reason, occupyTime, writeoffTime, createTime, createUser, updateTime, updateUser from union_order.resource_consumer_order limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into union_order.resource_consumer_order(mainOrderNo, tripOrderNo, cardId, cardNo, cardType, memberId, useStatus, reason, occupyTime, writeoffTime, createTime, createUser, updateTime, updateUser) values (#{mainorderno}, #{triporderno}, #{cardid}, #{cardno}, #{cardtype}, #{memberid}, #{usestatus}, #{reason}, #{occupytime}, #{writeofftime}, #{createtime}, #{createuser}, #{updatetime}, #{updateuser})
mapper.update:
update union_order.resource_consumer_order
mainOrderNo = #{mainorderno},
tripOrderNo = #{triporderno},
cardId = #{cardid},
cardNo = #{cardno},
cardType = #{cardtype},
memberId = #{memberid},
useStatus = #{usestatus},
reason = #{reason},
occupyTime = #{occupytime},
writeoffTime = #{writeofftime},
createTime = #{createtime},
createUser = #{createuser},
updateTime = #{updatetime},
updateUser = #{updateuser},
where id = #{id}
